headline: MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (MKTX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on MarketAxess Holdings Inc. on The Diversified Fins Analyst’s Substack by Collin Cook. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MKTX. MarketAxess Holdings Inc.’s share was trading at $159.99 as of December 1st. MKTX’s trailing and forward P/E were 27.19 and 19.38, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. At the […]

headline: Has MarketAxess Fallen Too Far After a 68% Five Year Slide?
summary: If you have been wondering whether MarketAxess Holdings is starting to look like a bargain or just a value trap, you are not alone. That is exactly what we are going to unpack here. Despite a modest rebound of 1.9% over the last week and 3.7% over the past month, the stock is still down 25.8% year to date and 30.4% over the last year, with a steep 68.0% slide over five years putting longer term holders under pressure. Recent headlines have focused on how electronic bond trading platforms...
